Hexxagon.View

Interface IPlayBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayBoard

    public interface IPlayBoard
    Contains method specifications of board view component of game.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPlayBoard.FinishCodeEnum
      Contains different reasons why the game was finished.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String folderAudio
      Relative path of folder of audio files.
      static String folderCSS
      Relative path of folder of css files.
      static String folderImage
      Relative path of folder of image files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animateAsAttackZone(int columnIndex, int rowIndex)
      Displays animation of attack zone when a cell is selected.

      Displays animation when a cell becomes unoccupied.

      Displays animation when a cell is occupied by a player.

      Displays animation when cells are assimilitated to the occupied cells.

      Displays animation when the click was occurred outside the attack zone.

      Displays animation when not the allowed player clicks on board.

      Sops to display the component.
      void refresh()
      Refreshes the component.

      Stops animation of showing attack zone.
      void show()
      Displays the view component.
      void showEndGameDialog(IPlayBoard.FinishCodeEnum caseCode, byte winnerIndex)
      Displays a dialog which shows the winer player.

      • show

   throws TError
        Displays the view component.

        Sops to display the component.

      • refresh

        void refresh()
      throws TError
        Refreshes the component. When component is refreshed than it rereads all data from data layer.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

                                              int rowIndex)
        Displays animation when not the allowed player clicks on board.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - Column index of clicked cell.
        rowIndex - Row index of clicked cell.

                                           int rowIndex)
        Displays animation when the click was occurred outside the attack zone.

        columnIndex - Column index of clicked cell.
        rowIndex - Row index of clicked cell.

      • animatePitWhenCapturedByPlayer

        void animatePitWhenCapturedByPlayer(int columnIndex,
                                    int rowIndex,
                                    byte playerIndex)
                             throws TError
        Displays animation when a cell is occupied by a player.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - Column index of clicked cell.
        rowIndex - Row index of clicked cell.
        playerIndex - The unique index of player who occupies the cell.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • showEndGameDialog

        void showEndGameDialog(IPlayBoard.FinishCodeEnum caseCode,
                       byte winnerIndex)
                throws TError
        Displays a dialog which shows the winer player.
        Parameters:
        caseCode - An FinishCodeEnum enum which represents the reason
        winnerIndex - Unique index of player.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
